titleStmt.title: Rosemary & Bayes, or, Animadversions upon a treatise called, The rehearsall trans-prosed [sic] in a letter to a friend in the countrey.
titleStmt.author: Stubbe, Henry, 1632-1676.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Henry Stubbes or Stubbe. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
